Description:
What A Great Location!
With new schools, shops, public transport, parks and kilometres of walking tracks all nearby, this immaculate 4 bedroom home is perfect for any growing family. Two separate living zones provide flexible living inside, whilst your choice of 2 separate alfresco dining areas are perfect for outdoor entertaining. The 414m2 allotment also provides for the perfect amount of lawn. The master bedroom features an ensuite and walk in robe, and all other bedrooms have built in robes. Tasteful décor and a neutral colour scheme throughout provide warmth and appeal, and mod cons such as split system air conditioning, stone benched kitchen with dishwasher, and a remote double garage with internal access make the home comfortable all year round. The propertys low maintenance design will also appeal to investors, so whether buying to live in or rent out, this is a home you can Inspect with confidence.
Insights: 5 Cerulean Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
The Perfect Modern Lifestyle in Arena.
Encapsulating all that is desirable in a contemporary family residence, this impressive home situated in the heart of Officers Arena Estate, boasts an exceptional quality build by SJD homes with an eye-catching contemporary facade, complemented by luxurious appointments throughout. Whilst offering an interior which exudes style, the immaculate exterior leaves nothing to be desired.
The residence features an entrance hall with impressive high ceilings, quality flooring flowing into the heart of the home. An expansive family domain incorporating an impressive kitchen with an abundance of storage and cupboard space plus Caesarstone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, glass splashback and dishwasher.
Tailored for entertaining with multiple living areas, with a grand open plan living and dining and a second living zone central to the kids bedrooms, ensuring all members of the family are catered for.
The master bedroom is surely to impress the most fastidious of buyers, generous in space with an expansive walk in robe and serviced by a private ensuite with double vanity, separate toilet and a great sized shower. The additional three bedrooms are large in size and fitted with double robes or triple built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Large glass sliding doors open to the immaculate outdoor alfresco area, this is truly the perfect entertaining home. Lead out to the private backyard enhanced with low maintenance landscaping all situated on a 450m2 approx. allotment.
Offering impressive extras, such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum system, plantation shutters throughout, laundry, garden shed, double remote-control garage with internal and external access and so much more.
The Arena Shopping precinct offers a choice of stores including Woolworths, bakery, chemist, medical centre and selection of eateries. Buses also operate throughout the estate and a short walk to Cardinia Train Station and only a stones throw away from the M1 freeway and primary and high schools within walking distance.
This beautiful home is not one to be missed and is ready for you to make memories of your own!
Contact Angelia or Susan to arrange a private inspection or see us at our open for inspection.
Insights: 32 Flinders Park Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
IN A CLASS OF ITS OWN
Indulge yourself in luxury in one of the Grandvue Estate's finest homes. Embraced by beautiful low maintenance gardens on a generous allotment, this home presents as the consummate family domain on a large scale.
It features a beautifully conceived layout with four substantial bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite), the remaining bedrooms equipped with BIR and generous proportions, all with easy access to the main bathroom. Further complimented by a large open plan living/dining area, this home provides an abundance of space and privacy.
This whole area opens out onto an extensive alfresco, allowing for effortless indoor/outdoor entertaining.
Other inclusions are ducted heating, split system cooling and a remote-controlled double garage. All this and more just a stroll from transport, shops, quality schools, parks and minutes from freeway access

Surrounded by premium homes the 476m2 block offers a diverse range of options to build your dream home and with limited stock available this block is worth an inspection.
Call Jeanine on 0438 332 411 today to avoid disappointment.

Description:
EXQUISITE STYLE & DESIGN!
•MAGNIFICENT FLOOR PLAN
•OFFICER’S BEST LOCATION
•SUPERB LIVING
A wonderful opportunity for buyers seeking an exceptional home in a prestigious locale, this Henley built stunner is better than new.
With 4 double bedrooms, master suite with deluxe ensuite & walk in robe, built in robes to bedrooms 2, 3 & 4, convenient additional bathroom & powder room.
Living space is outstanding with a private theatre/lounge and a supersize open plan family room with stunning high end built in floating timber cabinetry, open plan meals mergers with a stunning designer kitchen that meets all the expectations of a modern home- substantial storage, 900ml oven, oversized stone central bench/breakfast bar, dishwasher, secluded fridge cavity & walk in pantry.
Standouts include-
• Timber stacker sliding doors
• Timber look flooring
• Timeless color scheme
• Beautiful tiling
• Cameras for peace of mind
• Shutters on bedrooms 2/3/4
• Colorbond roof
• Professional landscaping
• Private feature screens
• Select tinted windows
• Rich timber decking front/rear
• Pergola for year round enjoyment
When location won’t be compromised this is the home- walk to the exceptional Timbertop Alfresco Cafe, amazing Parks/Gardens/Play Spaces, add the feeling that the very best community in Officer provides, this home is set in an exceptional prestigious pocket.
Along with Proposed new-Timbertop Primary school, retail stores and the new Officer Town Centre.

Description:
Architecturally Designed An Opulent Paradise
Sophistication meets contemporary. Grandeur comes to mind upon arrival, encapsulating modern appeal with an exposed aggregate driveway, large Vic Ash timber staircase, custom letterbox, and rendered pillars. Step through the large timber door to Wormy Chestnut hardwood flooring, to a staircase with stainless steel hand rail. The main area comprises of large kitchen, meals area and living area. The kitchen is fit for the chef, with induction cooktop, double stainless-steel oven, dish drawer, 40mm matte concrete finish stone island bench top, butler's pantry with fridge cavity. A true entertainers haven with three separate livings zones, a theatre room downstairs, step up rumpus room with a view of the meadows across the road and the main family living zone. Five spacious bedrooms with master suite elevated with views also. The walk-in robe and ensuite are executed to perfection with stone benchtops, double shower with niche, separate close off toilet. Three of the four other bedrooms provide ample floor space, walk in robes and plush high-quality carpet. All positioned around the main bathroom and toilet with are also meticulously finished to the highest possible standard. Downstairs the fifth bedroom is the largest room with built in robes. A separate inbuilt study area is an ideal space to work from home. Fitted out with data points and filing drawers. Extra internal features include, zoned ducted heating and cooling, ducted vacuum system, LED downlights, feature modern pendants, soft close drawers to kitchen and square set cornice. A triple garage with remote access of the panel lift door, sensor lighting as well as internal access. An alfresco that opens out the well-constructed backyard with 90mm and 140mm picture framed vic ash decking ideal for entertaining. In the warmer months you have your very own state of the art magna swimming pool. On a sloping block the landscape has been carefully thought out with side access, tiered garden beds out the back and plenty of side yard. Located in the Grandvue estate you are surrounded by the same class and quality of home, within walking distance to St Francis Xavier College, St Claire's Primary, and ample amount of parkland. Arena shopping centre is across the Princes Hwy where you have a large Woolworths, smaller specialty stores and café and take away shops. Easy access down Cardinia Road to the newly constructed Cardinia Road train station also to the M1 freeway which will have you in the city in no time.
Insights: 5 Avondale Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Tick All the Boxes on Hibiscus!
This modern 4 bedroom home is sure to impress!
As you walk through the front entrance youll find the first of your 3 living areas to your right. This room is as light and bright as you wish, with wooden shutters fitted to the front windows. To your left is the spacious master bedroom, with matching wooden shutter blinds on the front windows. You wont be strapped for space with the large walk in his & her robes! Then through to the ensuite where youll find stone benches, double vanity, separate toilet, and a large double shower!
The other 3 bedrooms are of generous size, complete with double built in robes, with sliding doors, and a top shelf. Each bedroom has matching holland blinds. These bedrooms are served by the main bathroom, which is modern and sleek! Theres a bath for the kids, but deep enough for mum and dad too. The shower has a large shower head, which is adjustable for all heights.
The main open area of the home showcases the modern kitchen, complete with stone bench tops, breakfast bar, ample storage, large walk in pantry with internal access from the garage, 900mm stainless steel appliances, stainless steel dishwasher, a large fridge space with plumbing and to finish it off nicely there is even a serving window to the outdoors! In the kitchen area, there is room for your dining table and lounge to keep in tune with the family feeling. The living doesnt finish there! To top it off you will be greeted with a large theatre room which can be fully closed off from the rest of the home if and when required to sit back and relax to your favourite movie.
Opening to the outdoor area is a large glass stacker sliding door, which makes the expansive space really flow. The alfresco area has a large portion undercover and some open for the nicer days. There is coloured concrete through the whole area, which allows you and the family to really spread out and entertain.
This home truly wouldnt be complete without the laundry that goes the extra mile. The laundry is spacious and open, there is a large walk in linen press with enough room to store all towels and linen for the whole house! There is built in cabinetry and an under bench washing basket already to go!
The property also has gas ducted heating throughout and a split-system in the main living area.
Last but not least, this is all situated on a 530m2 block, with a low maintenance yard, and double gates with side opening to the rear yard if you need to store the caravan or trailer?. The double car garage has a remote controlled door, and another single roller door on the back to bring items through.
This home will not disappoint! Please call Dan OLoughlin on 0418 148 157 now for an inspection!
Internal area
250.83m²

Description:
Simply The Best!
This property will surely be one of Officers most sort after homes, offering a grand entrance, four large open living areas which include a formal living room, kitchen boasting stone bench tops, Belling double oven, Miele dishwasher and W.I pantry, adjacent family room with gas fire place opening onto an extensive all year round outdoor entertaining area consisting of alfresco with patio blinds, plus covered & decked pergola, separate games/theatre room and an additional upstairs retreat/family room.
Of course, an imposing home of this nature has four double bedrooms plus additional fitted study, the master with WIR & ensuite incorporating a separate toilet, main bathroom, laundry and powder room with 3rd toilet.
The property is still further enhanced by a double garage with internal access and motorised door, workshop, easy to maintain garden and quality fittings throughout include ducted heating, central refrigerated air-conditioning, floor coverings, window furnishing, security system and much more.
Superbly located abutting other quality properties and within close proximity of shops, schools, recreational facilities and public transort.
You wont find a better family home than this.

Description:
Fixed Date Sale closes Saturday 2nd of Nov at 4PM
If you are looking for a great quality home for you and your family then this is the one. Situated on 576m2 you will be the envy of all your friends.
The home comprises four bedrooms and two great sized living areas with the open plan central kitchen overlooking the main family area which opens to the rear undercover alfresco.
The kitchen comes complete with a 900mm stainless steel cooker, dishwasher and a walk in pantry whilst the separate lounge is situated at the rear of the home. Perfect for a teenager or theatre room.
The bedrooms are all a great size, with built in wardrobes with the master suite complete with an ensuite and its own walk in wardrobe. There is also a double remote garage fitted with storage shelving with rear and internal access.
Extras include ducted vacuum, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, rear garden shed and a security alarm system! There is also great storage solutions in the garage for all your bits and pieces.
This property is available for private inspection most days. Just send us an email enquiry and we will automatically respond with the available open times.
To ensure there is enough demand to inspect the property, please advise us of your wish to attend by simply following these instructions.
- Book inspection
- Select a date and time based on the options displayed
- Enter your details
- Select register inspection time
Youre finished! Well keep you updated if anything changes, but otherwise we look forward to meeting you at our Hodges Open for Inspection.
** Photo ID required at ALL inspections.
** Investors: Did you know Hodges Real Estate Cranbourne has the highest Google ranking for Property Management in Cranbourne? Our department head of rentals has appraised this property at $400 p/w - $420p/w ($1738 -$1825pcm) for more details about leasing contact Ben on 03 5996 5993 today

Description:
A MAJESTIC LOCATION!
Wake up to a clean-cut gem, this immaculately presented home is ideally positioned on a well-established allotment in the highly sought-after Grandvue Estate. This home has been well loved by its current owners and it's location provides prime position with private schooling and amenities at your fingertips.
Quality built with a modern-day floor plan, this four-bedroom rendered home comprises of the following features:
- Generous Master bedroom complete with 'his and hers' robes and a full size ensuite.
- Three further bedrooms with double built-in robes.
- Central appointed kitchen featuring, stainless steel appliances including 900mm freestanding gas cooktop and oven adjacent to an island bench, double door panty, Caesar stone bench-tops & ample cupboard space.
- Semi-enclosed pergola area with a pass though kitchen; an excellent place to lay out beverages, a buffet dinner or to pass out the meat for the summer BBQ
- Low-maintenance, landscaped gardens.
- Have the flexibility to entertain again! With yet another pergola area at the rear, great for a party purchaser.
- Remote double lock-up garage with internal access & rear access.
- Front living area with Gas log fire, great for a warm movie night.
- Rear living with kitchen/meals and large family area with split ac system for comfort.
- Additional extras include: ducted heating, A/C Spilt cooling, led lighting and NBN.
Only 8 years young and situated in a great location just walking distance to reserves, walkways, St Francis Xavier College, St Clare's Primary School, Arena shopping centre, medical centres, supermarkets and Cardinia Train Station; I know this is home is second to none & in best location! Get in touch with Simon Murphy to register your interest and secure a fantastic family home in Officer.

This perfectly situated Federation style home captures spectacular views in the majestic Grandvue Estate. Upon inspection you'll be in awe of this 'one of a kind residence'.
Adorned with federation features throughout, this gorgeous home includes
- 3 bedrooms all with built in robes and ceiling fans
- Generous sized master bedroom with sliding door access to backyard and walk in robe and ensuite,
- Theatre room with internal surround sound
- Spacious American style attic for storage
- Conara Wood heating
- Split system heating and cooling
- Walk in pantry
- Euromaid 900ml country style cooker
- Outdoor entertaining area with automatic electric blinds
- Low maintenance garden
- Security system throughout
- Plenty of storage internal and external
With exceptionally close walking distance to St Clare's Primary School and St Francis Xavier College, you are also close to shopping centres, Cardinia train station and only minutes the M1 freeway.
This very unique home is available now for inspections. Contact Brendan Langley for your personal viewing.

Description:
Low maintenance living at its best!
This ideally located modern home is just 2 years young and perfect for growing families, investors as well as first home buyers. Set in the Potters Grove Estate known for its fantastic family friendly environment and only minutes to the Arena shopping complex for all your shopping needs.
Glistening with space, light and high ceilings, this convenient home offers four good sized bedrooms, two bathrooms and a functional floorplan plan right from the entrance through to the back yard. The master suite enticing a walk-in robe and ensuite. The three remaining bedrooms are a great size, complete with built-in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
The well-appointed open plan kitchen, dining and living zone features stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, oven/cooktop and breakfast. Doors open to the magnificent low maintenance outdoor area with synthetic turf.
Other notable features include; ducted heating, high ceilings, 2x split system, laundry, double car garage with internal and external access, set on and easy care 294m2 block. This is a must inspect, be quick to call today!

Description:
Prestigious Carlisle Family Home.
Setting the benchmark in pristine family living proudly presented for sale, 19 Callistemon Street, Officer. Flawlessly presented and built with exceptional quality by Carlisle homes, this home promotes the perfect family lifestyle in the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate. Designed to stand out with a radiating modern façade, this will have you wanting to call home.
Making a statement from the moment you arrive with a wide hallway entrance drawing you inside the home. Tailored for entertaining with multiple living areas, with a grand open plan living and dining, a second living zone servicing the kids bedrooms and a third generous size living zone to the front of the home, ensuring all family members are catered for.
The sophisticated contemporary kitchen is truly the heart of the home, with no expense spared and equipped with the highest quality of fixtures and fittings, such as 900mm stainless steel appliances, Caesarstone benchtops, overheard cupboards, glass splashback, ample bench space and spacious walk in pantry with plenty of storage solutions.
The grand master bedroom features a walk-in robe and private ensuite with double vanity and oversized shower. The additional three bedrooms with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Entertain in style with the covered alfresco and extended decking, perfect for hosting all year round, whilst overlooking the easy to maintain landscaped backyard.
Offering impressive extras, such as ducted heating, split system cooling, expansive laundry with walk in linen, plantation shutters throughout, double remote-control garage with internal and external access and so much more.
This home is not one to be missed.
Internal area

Description:
SUPERB SINGLE LEVEL TOWNHOUSE - OFFICER
No body corporate fees, great location..
If you're looking for a simplified life that frees up time and money for more important endeavours, this property is for you. The practical single level design of this townhouse will surprise, as inside you're greeted with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, open plan family area, double garage and the bonus of large pergola with a generous North facing courtyard for year-round enjoyment.
The kitchen features an electric oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher, walk in pantry, space for a modern fridge and a stone bench with breakfast bar. It's positioned to be inclusive, as it looks directly over the dining/family room and beyond to the outdoor entertaining area. The master bedroom comes complete with ensuite and walk-in robe, while the remaining bedrooms have BIR's and access to a large main bathroom with shower and bath, separate toilet and a full-sized laundry.
The practical features continue with gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a double remote garage with a manual rear double roller door. All this and only metres from a lake, a 1.2km stroll to the Cardinia Train Station and shops, immediate access to the Monash Freeway and zoned for Bridgewood Primary and Officer Secondary College.
This is a must view for property so book your inspection today!

Description:
Dont wait to build - be in for Christmas
Bursting with family appeal and positioned in an impressive high growth area this Fairhaven home is only 12 months old and still under warranty.
Spacious, light and bright with generous living areas this sensational new home has all that of a modern young home, timber floors, clean white walls and quality window furnishings, comprising; 4 good sized bedrooms, the master with full en-suite, separate formal lounge room, white gloss kitchen boasting stone benches, quality stainless steel appliances, including built-in microwave, freestanding range cooker and a dishwasher. Family meals area leading to the outside entertaining alfresco at the rear with pergola.
Other features to note are; ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a single remote lockup garage with internal access and all enjoying a wonderful location, close to Officer train station, quality schools, parklands, convenient freeway access and a short drive to Westfield Fountain Gate, Berwick or Beaconsfield.
